title: Dagannoth Rex

Dagannoth Rex is the Melee-based Dagannoth King found in the depths of the Waterbirth Island Dungeon, along with fellow Dagannoth Kings, Dagannoth Supreme and Dagannoth Prime. Rex is the only monster to drop the Berserker and Warrior rings, which can become best-in-slot rings for Strength and Slash after being imbued at the Nightmare Zone. He, along with the other Dagannoth Kings, can also drop the rare dragon axe.

Location[edit | edit source]

Location Levels Members Spawns Map
Waterbirth Island Dungeon3031Maplink
Waterbirth Island Dungeon3031Maplink
  • There is a separate cave available for those on a slayer task. Accessed by right clicking the ladder that leads to the Dagannoth Kings.

Strategy[edit | edit source]

Main article: Dagannoth Kings/Strategies
Luring Rex to a safespot.

Dagannoth Rex has an extremely low Magic Defence, so it is recommended to use Magic against him. Popular choices include Slayer Dart, Iban Blast, and powered staves.

Due to his large size and the fact he uses melee attacks only, it is recommended to get him stuck on one of the ridges of the lair and safespot him (note that Spinolyps will still be constantly attacking while you're safespotting). Many players use high-level armour such as Barrows armour, which give high Defence bonuses while still being able to hit Rex constantly with spells due to his very low Magic Defence, even if their magic attack bonus is below zero. Players who use Guthan's are advised heal themselves on the Spinolyps while waiting on respawns to help preserve food and potions.

Dangers[edit | edit source]

  • If players venture too far out west to lure Dagannoth Rex, they risk attracting attention from both Dagannoth Prime and Dagannoth Supreme. Prime is the bigger threat since he wanders closer to the east and north-east. This can be avoided by staying in the southeastern part of the arena, as Prime will rarely (if ever) go there, and attack Rex only when he's nearest to the east.

Drops[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 217,761 kills from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

The average Dagannoth Rex kill is worth 30,723.85.

The average Dagannoth Rex kill while on a Konar task is worth 32,645.63.

Combat Achievements[edit | edit source]

The following Combat Achievement tasks involve Dagannoth Rex.

Name Description Difficulty Category
Dagannoth Rex Champion Kill Dagannoth Rex 10 times. Medium Kill count
A Frozen King Kill Dagannoth Rex whilst he is immoblized. Medium Mechanical
Dagannoth Rex Adept Kill Dagannoth Rex 25 times. Hard Kill count
Death to the Warrior King Kill Dagannoth Rex whilst under attack by Dagannoth Supreme and Dagannoth Prime. Elite Mechanical
Toppling the Diarchy Kill Dagannoth Rex and one other Dagannoth king at the exact same time. Elite Mechanical

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
5 March 2015
(update | poll)

Dagannoth bones are now noted drops if you have completed the Fremennik Elite Diary.

17 July 2014
(update | poll)

Players can now receive a pet version of this boss after defeating it.
